author: Jeanette Halverson
comment: Forceful. Even though you put your own alarm sound in, these idiots change it.
title: Trash

author: sat sarbat khalsa
comment: So you have to pay to remove adds if you want a reliable app
title: Ads turn alarm off

author: Gijsbert van der Heijden
comment: Good, but you should really try the pro version

author: عۙــلۧـۉ୭ڜـۜۧي
comment: Nice

author: SARA POPE
comment: It definitely did what I needed it to do but when I didn't have an alternate dismissal already selected and I had accidentally set my Wi-Fi signal strength needed too high there was no alternate shut off...I had to do an emergency uninstall just to get it to shut off. I now know this so I reinstalled it but when it's 5 a.m. it's a hard lesson to learn.
title: Did what I needed

author: Joshua W
comment: My favourite feature is the alarm that can only be turned off via a strong wifi signal. It literally forces me to get out of bed.
title: Best alarm clock

author: Brad Lemmond
comment: I have been using the app for months, then I had to do a hard reset on my phone and I've been looking for this app for 2 days and I'm so relieved.
title: Love this app

author: G ML
comment: Completely unreliable
title: Doesn't always ring

author: Adithya Sekar
comment: Great minimalistic app.
title: Makes you wakeup!

author: Derek Phillips
comment: This is the best alarm clock I have found. I sleep incredibly hard and most alarms time out before I even hear it or can only snooze a couple of times. I can snooze this puppy for hours and it won't stop until I dismiss it. Seriously. This is the only one I trust to wake me up.
title: Yasss!

author: Prudy Remck
comment: It works well when it works. However, if you are too close (in my case 18 ft) to your router it doesn't always turn off. Also the clock does not stay on when it is set to. You have to go into the application and turn it on every time you want to see the clock. Although it seems to be the best one out there.

author: Jaime Small
comment: This alarm is awesome. It really makes you get out of bed to turn it off and will even turn your phone back on if you turned out off!
title: It works

author: Neil Barrett
comment: It's perfect
title: There is just no way around this alarm

author: Shannon McConchie
comment: It will wake the dead (that's me!)
title: Nice!!!!!

author: A Google User
comment: This app does what it says, very smart way of getting an alarm clock to work.  Took a bit of time to set up, but now I know how its great.  Only thing I would like is an option to turn off the icon in the notification bar but that's just a small personal preference. Great job.  Edit: not sure what's going on but recently the snooze button has not been showing up when the alarm goes off. All the settings are the same as when it did. This is a big bug for me hope it's fixed  soon
title: Very good works

author: Amber Brown
comment: Best alarm ever. I can't believe more people don't use this. I always wake up late, but with this app it gets you out of bed. you have movein order to turn it off. It's a perfect fit for me.
title: Had to have it for my new phone

author: Hamid Khatibi
comment: When yoi have to get up to turn it off you become awake enough not to go to bed again!
title: Wakes you up 100%

author: Orlando Williams
comment: Forces you to wake up and get up to shut it up. I use the ultimate warrior theme to get me going! Great app.
title: Ingenious concept

author: Vinícius de Oliveira Henriques
comment: Excelent idea and is very helpfull :D But still have some weird bugs and sometimes the app didn't played the alarm song and, of course, not waking me up.
title: Still a young App

author: Kim Lindberg
comment: set two alarms and slept through both.
title: crap

author: Khalid Akthinayyan
comment: Didn't stop even I was 100% next to the wifi broad band
title: S4

author: Rasmus Thornqvist
comment: Works like a charm and it is just simply wonderful.
title: Just perfect.

author: Michael Allen
comment: Fantastic Idea, well implemented.
title: Fantastic Idea

author: Sila Kayo
comment: Works like a charm.

author: Warren Malone
comment: It actually works.  all the problem solving apps just don't work on me. if i am not out of bed the moment i solve the problem i will go back to bed.  I will dismiss alarms before i get out of bed. I will just force kill the program  I use the app on my nexus 7 that I can't remove the batteries. after a week of getting up AT 8am  with no snoozing my brain is finally waking up just before the alarm so.   Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you so much for this app.  Please make a pay for donation version.
title: Life Changing

author: Lee Kramer
comment: I am terrible about getting up in the morning this app does not let me snooze off until I'm late. I have to run downstairs in front of the router to turn it off!! GENIUS!!!
title: Must have for Snoozers

author: Branislav Kovacevic
comment: I overslept again... and I found notices "Alarm stopped after 2x minutes" and another one after 27 I beleive. Why does it stop. Apparently it rang, but I never heard it and it stopped on it's own. So if you are a really tight sleeper like me - there has to be option for alarm to never stop ringing until you turn it off. I checked and didn't found it. Developer: Please add the option for the never ending alarm unless it's stopped by user and it will be perfect. (Please note that I disabled "Alarm Timeout - Alarm shuts down after 10 minutes" option, and it still stopped ringing after some time)
title: Great concept, but...

author: Arthur St.James
comment: I love this alarm clock because it works. Plain and simple. And it works every time. It has never crashed or failed to wake me up. I need something like this because I'm a heavy sleeper. Well worth a couple bucks.
title: It works

author: Seth Brown
comment: ~~**(DONT READ IF U USE THIS ALARM)**~~ I loved this app & it really worked but I found a sneaky way to avoid it wen I use it. Wen I'm still half asleep and the alarm goes off I just turn off my phone. Obviously the nag alarms don't work when its off. There probably isn't a way around it but can you try? Maybe disabling the lock button when in this app, but then you would have to make it unable to leave the app. Aw but I just thought of another work around...taking out the battery and you can't control that
title: Great app but...suggestions!

author: Nada Smith
comment: I'm happy with this app aside from one glitch.  The music I select for the alarm changes at random to an awful shrill beeping. I really really hate it.  Please fix for 5 ★'s.
title: Only one problem

author: Jerry Griego
comment: It's not working on my Galaxy Note 3. An update for sport would be nice!
title: I've used this for a long time but,

author: Khairatun Nisa
comment: Usually my phone wud hav the alarm blastin to it's maximum volume in which wud make me fully awake than a much softer volume which im experiencing now even with my phone system volume been set to its max. Pls fix it.
title: Alarm volume problem

author: Stephen Jones
comment: The only alarm that's been able to get me out of bed at the same time every day.  Works a treat! Thanks. :-)
title: Absolutely Brilliant! 50 Stars!

author: Pranav Raj
comment: This one never failed & I love this app. My Note 2 had been locked so formated and I lost this app but I am downloading it again..
title: Best one..

comment: Could be me but the volume is too soft and music lulls back to sleep
title: Never woke up once. Lol

comment: Bad srsy!!!! That stupid alarm clock just took 11 ours to download and I had school fix it to five stars plz cause that alarm clock is stupid ugh!!!!

comment: I think this is awesome...ive looked at a lot of alarms and this is by far the best one...great concept...alot of manageability....thanks...
title: Alarmimgly Excellent!!!

author: Kohaku K
comment: I'm not sure if I love it or hate it. It does work perfectly (unfortunately). It's really great!

author: Abdulkader Ramadan
comment: The idea is very good but every time I set an alarm and use the snooze I wakeup late and I find that me phone battery is totally dead  LG Optimus G
title: Like it but

author: Muhammad Saqib
comment: Its great, Now I will be regular in my morning prayers :)
title: Great APP
